title: when the next season starts do all ranks get wiped.....fresh start??
body: i came into league as a noob maining ashe and yi... playing ashe till lvl 30 losing every ranked game. but now i think im a gold player inside a bronze body.......... next year will the ranked score restart?? reply if u know much love........feel free to gift :)

replies.body:
'im a gold player inside a bronze body' could be a plausible statement. Where as he may have the game knowledge of a gold player, his mechanics and decision making are of a bronze player.

Sorta like Montecristo

> 
> Sorta like Montecristo

when you say knowledge what exactly do u mean?
Knowledge could be many things (cd of abilities, know all the abilities of all the champions, knowing the playstyle of champions, knowing the powerspikes of champions, knowing objective control, knowing cheese strats etc)

This sounds a lot like me. I'll admit I suck mechanically. I cannot carry and that's why I belong in bronze. But I do have an understanding of how to play the game much high then what my rank says. 
It's to bad that the only way to get out of bronze is to carry yourself.

MMR gets "compressed" back to 1250. That means that not everyone gets reset to 1250 mmr. (which is the base mmr btw). 

Also, I wouldn't say "I'm a gold player in a bronze body," because SOOO many bronzies say that. Instead of acting arrogant, you should work on silver mechanics first like warding, map awareness, objective control and farming
Your ranking does get reset (you will have to do provisional games again). But where you start next season does depend on where you end in this preseason.
its a soft reset. not a FULL restart on ur mmr
